str2: Instantly, immediately, on the spot. From para and chrema; at the thing itself, i.e. Instantly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The mouth, speech, eloquence in speech, the point of a sword.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To open. From ana and oigo; to open up.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The tongue; by implication, a language.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (lit: I speak well of) I bless; pass: I am blessed. From a compound of eu and logos; to speak well of, i.e. to bless.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
